nodes.bodyText:
this is needed for Hive 3 only.

https://github.com/prestosql/docker-images/blob/4aadfb19cf5a3d7a2576f4cd670c9ced21debf53/prestodev/hdp3.1-hive/files/etc/hive/conf/hive-site.xml#L69-L70

+following property definition to the Hive metastore configuration file
